title: Community Kitchen with Espresso Bar, Washers & Dryers
map_address: 2045 S. Forum Drive near Sara Jane Pkwy
posting_body: ['Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 74', 'OR Text', '74', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our team directly.', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 732 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Just in case you needed proof that life is good, here comes Copeland.', "This new apartment community in Grand Prairie will live up to the city's reputation of happy residents with vibrant social spaces and a resort-worthy pool & spa.", '(Did we mention there will be complimentary kombucha on tap in the game room?)', 'When staying home is in order, our fabulously appointed apartments come with all the bells and whistles.', 'Come on over to Copeland', 'and get happy.', 'Features:', 'Wood-Style Plank Flooring, Modern, Flat-Panel Cabinets with Under-Cabinet Lighting, Stainless Steel Appliances, Oversized Walk-In Closets & Additional Private Storage*, Quartz Countertops & Subway Tile Backsplashes, Washers & Dryers', 'Community Amenities:', 'Resort-worthy pool, Dog Park, 24-Hour Fitness Studio, Game Room, Community Kitchen with Espresso Bar, Patio Lounge with Ping Pong & BBQ Grills, Conference Room & Private Offices, Complimentary kombucha on tap, Electric Vehicle (EV) Charging Stations, Yoga & Spin Room', 'Pet Policy', 'Pets - Max 2 allowed, One time Fee $350, Rent $25', 'Comments: At Copeland, we welcome your furry friends!', 'We charge a $350 non- refundable pet fee per pet and $25 monthly pet rent, per pet.', 'Restrictions: Breed restrictions apply.', 'All pets will require registration, photos, and records in <URL>, and an additional fee will apply.', 'Interested In This Unit?', 'Use this link for more details:', '<URL>', 'vBQGRH7zS2']
